sources.title: Man of the Forest
sources.description: Beasley (Noah Beery), who is after Gayner's (Harry Carey) land, plans to kidnap his daughter (Verna Hillie). But Dale (Randolph Scott) overhears their plan and kidnaps her himself. When Gayner arrives to retrieve his daughter, Beasley kills him and makes the Sheriff (Tom Kennedy) arrest Dale for the murder.

sources.title: Man of the Forest (1933) RANDOLPH SCOTTüçïZANE GREY
sources.description:
Stars: Randolph Scott, Verna Hillie, Harry Carey
Director: Henry Hathaway
Writer: Zane Grey (novel) |

Beasley, who is after Gayner's land, plans to kidnap his daughter. But Dale overhears their plan and kidnaps her himself. When Gayner arrives to retrieve his daughter, Beasley kills him and makes the Sheriff arrest Dale for the murder.

metadata.Plot: Beasley, who is after Gayner's land, plans to kidnap his daughter. But Dale overhears their plan and kidnaps her himself. When Gayner arrives to retrieve his daughter, Beasley kills him and makes the Sheriff arrest Dale for the murder.

metadata.Actors: Randolph Scott, Verna Hillie, Harry Carey
